dlr.decision: Implement manual bridge protocol for transfer patients (immediate) + emergency formulary push to Community (systemic fix)
dlr.decided_by: Chief Medical Officer + Chief Pharmacy Officer

alternatives_rejected.description: Revert General to old formulary until sync verified
alternatives_rejected.rejection_reason: Disrupts new protocol for 450-bed facility; reversal risk higher than bridge protocol

counter_claims: Pharmacy argued full formulary revert is safer (rejected — General patients already on new agent)
Community CMO confirmed bridge protocol is clinically equivalent for transfer window

new_edges: Formulary change approval → mandatory cross-facility sync verification gate
Patient transfer → automatic formulary consistency check at receiving facility
